text: The Kane Chronicles are a series of fantasy novels by Rick Riordan. The characters are based on Egyptian mythology. The story is set in the same universe as Riordan's Percy Jackson & the Olympians, The Heroes of Olympus, The Trials of Apollo, and Magnus Chase and the Gods of Asgard series. ==Characters== *Carter Kane: One of the heroes of the series. Is one of the two most powerful magicians that ever lived. Sadie Kane's Brother, Amos Kane's nephew and Julius and Ruby Kane's son *Sadie Kane: One of the heroes in the series. Carter Kane's sister, Amos Kane's niece and Julius and Ruby Kane's daughter. Is one of the two most powerful magicians that ever lived. *Amos Kane: Magician of the House of Life. Julius Kane's brother and Carter and Sadie Kane's uncle. Category:Books by Rick Riordan
title: The Kane Chronicles
